name: ELTSS
title: Electronic Long-Term Services and Supports (eLTSS) Release 1 - US Realm
publisher: HL7 International Community-Based Care and Privacy Work Group
description: Provides guidance to US Realm implementers to use the FHIR for implementing access and exchange Electronic Long-Term Services and Supports (eLTSS) Dataset data  elements

grouping.name: Logical Models
grouping.description: Logical models document the requirements of the LTSS domain without alignment to FHIR. The only thing that makes the logical models 'FHIR Logical Models' is the use of the StructureDefinition resource as a formal representation. The purpose of the logical model is to gather requirements from domain experts that can subsequently feed into the design process for profiles and implementation guides. A logical model ‘bridges the gap’ by documenting the requirements in a computable fashion without placing any constraints on the model structure.

grouping.name: eLTSS Profiles
grouping.description: General constraints on FHIR resources to be adhered to as part of the eLTSS implementation guide that apply regardless of what area(s) of Long Term Care are of interest

grouping.name: Extensions
grouping.description: Extensions defined as part of the eLTSS implementation guide

grouping.name: ValueSet(s)
grouping.description: ValueSet(s) used in the eLTSS Implementation Guide
